commit message:
Merge pull request #353 from Grunthos/master

4.0.6 release
fixing Issue #321. Previously Searched Authors care now shown on list
Show recently used & added author names in the search-by-name dialogue.

Bug fix when adding books via means other than 'Search Internet'

- code was incorrectly assuming an author textview would be present in
all cases
Make comments field stretch to fit text
Fix bug in google books URL causing wrong books to be returned

Re-prioritize data sources based on reliability and the data returned

- don't overwrite ISBNs
- Ignore results with mismatching ISBN
- prefer results that have an ISBN
